mapper.sql: id, user_id, content, kind, thumbs, create_time, update_time, pics
mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS userId, u.head_pic AS userPic, u.user_name AS userName, u.sex AS userSex, u.cover_pic AS coverPic, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,u.birthday,NOW()) AS userAge, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM follows WHERE user_id = #{browserId} AND target_id = #{userId}) AS followed FROM `user` u WHERE u.id = #{userId}
SELECT d.id AS dynamicId, d.content AS dynamicContent, d.create_time AS createTime, d.pics, d.thumbs AS thumbCount FROM DYNAMIC d WHERE d.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT dc.dynamic_id AS dynamicId, dc.pid AS pid, dc.id AS commentId, dc.user_id AS userId, u.head_pic AS userPic, u.user_name AS userName, dc.create_time AS createTime, dc.content AS content FROM dynamic_comment dc LEFT JOIN USER u ON u.id = dc.user_id WHERE dc.dynamic_id = #{dynamicId}

SELECT t.id AS dynamicId, t.content AS dynamicContent, t.thumbs AS thumbCount, t.pics AS pics, t.create_time AS createTime, t.kind, t.lat, t.lng, u.id AS userId, u.head_pic AS userPic, u.user_name AS userName, u.sex AS userSex, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,u.birthday,NOW()) AS userAge, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM follows f WHERE f.target_id = t.user_id) AS followCount, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM dynamic_comment dc WHERE dc.dynamic_id = t.id) AS commentCount, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM give_thumb gt WHERE gt.user_id = #{userId} AND gt.dynamic_id = t.id AND gt.status = 0) AS thumbed, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM follows f WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} AND f.target_id = t.user_id AND f.status = 0) AS followed FROM DYNAMIC t LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.id = t.user_id ORDER BY t.id DESC

SELECT t1.*, u.id AS userId, u.head_pic AS userPic, u.user_name AS userName, u.sex AS userSex, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,u.birthday,NOW()) AS userAge, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM follows f WHERE f.target_id = t1.user_id) AS followCount, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM dynamic_comment dc WHERE dc.dynamic_id = t1.dynamicId) AS commentCount, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM give_thumb gt WHERE gt.user_id = #{userId} AND gt.dynamic_id = t1.dynamicId AND gt.status = 0) AS thumbed, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM follows f WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} AND f.target_id = t1.user_id AND f.status = 0) AS followed FROM ( SELECT t.id AS dynamicId, t.content AS dynamicContent, t.thumbs AS thumbCount, t.pics AS pics, t.kind, t.lat, t.lng, t.create_time AS createTime, t.user_id as user_id FROM dynamic t, ( SELECT user_id as user_id FROM follows WHERE target_id = #{userId} UNION SELECT target_id as user_id FROM follows WHERE user_id = #{userId} ) f WHERE t.user_id = f.user_id ) t1 LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.id = t1.user_id ORDER BY t1.dynamicId DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE d,dc,gt FROM dynamic d LEFT JOIN dynamic_comment dc on dc.dynamic_id = d.id LEFT JOIN give_thumb gt on gt.dynamic_id = d.id WHERE d.id = #{dynamicId} and d.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id AS dynamicId, t.content AS dynamicContent, t.thumbs AS thumbCount, t.pics AS pics, t.create_time AS createTime, u.id AS userId, u.head_pic AS userPic, u.user_name AS userName, u.sex AS userSex, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,u.birthday,NOW()) AS userAge, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM follows f WHERE f.target_id = t.user_id) AS followCount, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM dynamic_comment dc WHERE dc.dynamic_id = t.id) AS commentCount, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM give_thumb gt WHERE gt.user_id = #{userId} AND gt.dynamic_id = t.id AND gt.status = 0) AS thumbed, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM follows f WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} AND f.target_id = t.user_id AND f.status = 0) AS followed FROM DYNAMIC t LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.id = t.user_id WHERE t.id = #{dynamicId}
